hero.title: Your Gateway to Premium Salvage Vehicles
hero.subtitle: Access thousands of salvage and clean-title vehicles from auctions worldwide. Bid, win, and ship globally.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple 3-step process to get your vehicle

step1.title: Browse & Bid
step1.description: Explore our vast inventory and place your bids on vehicles you love

step2.title: Win & Pay
step2.description: Once you win, complete payment securely through our platform

step3.title: Ship & Receive
step3.description: We handle worldwide shipping right to your doorstep

cta.title: Ready to Find Your Next Vehicle?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of buyers saving big on quality vehicles

inventory.title: Vehicle Inventory
inventory.subtitle: Browse our complete selection of auction vehicles

inTransit.title: In Transit
inTransit.subtitle: Vehicles available for direct sale while in transit to Moldova
inTransit.infoTitle: Buy while vehicle is on the road
inTransit.infoDescription: These vehicles are already in transit to Moldova and can be purchased directly, without waiting for auction. Reserve your desired vehicle now and receive it when it arrives in the country.
inTransit.statusInTransitDesc: Vehicle is on the way to destination
inTransit.statusArrivedDesc: Vehicle has arrived and is available

deliveryTimes.title: Delivery Times
deliveryTimes.subtitle: Real-time terminal status and shipping timeframes
deliveryTimes.timeframe1: From the moment of purchase to arrival at the terminal
deliveryTimes.timeframe2: From arrival at the terminal to loading into the container*
deliveryTimes.timeframe3: From loading into the container to the ship's departure
deliveryTimes.timeframe4: From the ship's departure to the ship's arrival

savannah.status: Products arrive pretty fast at Savannah after you buy them. Loading doesn't take too long, but there's a wide range of time for ships to set off. The sea journey can take a while.

houston.status: At the Houston Terminal, products arrive at a typical speed after purchase. The loading process can sometimes stretch, and the ships, after being loaded, take a moderate time to reach their destinations.
